name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Webflow Engineer with a strong focus on responsive design and CMS, leveraging 10+ years of experience in backend development to create efficient and engaging web experiences. Proficient in **Webflow**, **Figma**, and **Svelte**, with a solid understanding of SEO and analytics for optimized site performance. Skilled in site integrations, microinteractions, and animations to enhance user engagement. Excellent collaboration and communication abilities, successfully contributing to team goals in dynamic environments. Previously engineered backend systems for financial platforms, using technologies such as **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), and cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Webflow** and **CMS** for developing responsive designs and implementing microinteractions, ensuring high-quality user experience across various devices.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate SEO best practices and site analytics, leading to a **35%** increase in organic traffic.
Designed and executed effective site integrations, leveraging **Figma** for robust prototypes, reducing development time by **20%**.
Implemented responsive design techniques to optimize site performance and compatibility across **9** major browsers.
Facilitated effective communication among team members to enhance project collaboration and streamline the development process.
Introduced innovative animations using **Svelte**, improving user engagement metrics by **25%**.

Developed responsive designs and site integrations using **Webflow** and **Svelte**, enhancing user experience and increasing page load efficiency by **30%**.
Created and implemented SEO strategies to improve site visibility and achieve a **40%** increase in organic traffic within **6 months**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline content management workflows using **CMS** solutions, ensuring timely content delivery and integration.
Utilized analytics tools to track user engagement and optimize site performance, resulting in a **25%** improvement in user retention rates.
Designed and executed microinteractions and animations in **Figma**, significantly enhancing user interaction and engagement on web applications.
Conducted comprehensive testing to ensure responsive design compatibility across various devices, reducing error reports by **50%** during initial rollout.
Facilitated effective communication and collaboration among teams to ensure successful project completion and adherence to timelines.

Demonstrated expertise in **Webflow** and responsive design to create user-friendly, visually appealing web applications that enhance user experience.
Utilized **Figma** for effective collaboration and design implementation, ensuring alignment with stakeholders through polished aesthetics and functionality.
Analyzed site performance and implemented optimized **SEO** strategies to boost organic traffic by **20%**.
Integrated various **CMS** solutions and third-party tools, ensuring seamless communication between the website and backend services.
Oversaw analytics setup to monitor user interactions, leveraging insights to drive continuous improvements across multiple projects.
Developed engaging user experiences through microinteractions and animations utilizing **Svelte** to attract and retain users on the platform.
Maintained collaborative communication with cross-functional teams, fostering a productive environment to successfully deliver projects with a satisfaction rate above **90%**.

skills:
*****Frontend Frameworks*****
	Figma, Svelte, responsive design, animations, microinteractions, site integrations, CMS, SEO, analytics, collaboration, communication

*****Programming Languages*****
	Python (3.8+), SQL, Bash, JavaScript

*****Backend Frameworks*****
	FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery

*****API Technologies*****
	REST/gRPC APIs, Microservices, Kafka

*****Serverless and Cloud Functions*****
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure

*****Databases*****
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

*****DevOps*****
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, CI/CD, PyTest, Git

*****Cloud & Infrastructure*****
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure

*****Other*****
	Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow
